description.value: This code system contains codes that identify the event a message represents.

display.value: Process the eICR that is the focus of the eCR Task referenced by the eCR MessageHeader. See [Electronic Initial Case_Report (eICR) Transaction and Profiles](Electronic_Initial_Case_Report_(eICR)_Transaction_and_Profiles.html) for further details.

Process the RR that is the focus of the eCR Task referenced by the eCR MessageHeader. See [Reportability_Response_(RR)_Transaction_and_Profiles.html](Reportability_Response_(RR)_Transaction_and_Profiles.html) for further details.
